Ahh!
You want to extend the existing Rich Text widget! That is possible and you can [follow the docs on extending a widget](https://docs.kentico.com/x/8wWiCQ).
For example, if you wanted to wrap the rich text widget in some specific design or layout you can adjust the rendering of the view file for your extended widget and then render the existing widget inside your new markup.
The extended widget can have as many custom properties as you want _and_ you aren't limited to just supplying a custom properties class and a view - you can use a full view component. Just take a look at [the FallbackFormWidget in the Kentico Community Portal](https://github.com/Kentico/community-portal/blob/v30.4.1.5/src/Kentico.Community.Portal.Web/Components/Widgets/Forms/FallbackFormWidget.cs#L61).
